name: SimpleField_transformTest
description: Unit tests for the transformation functionality of the SimpleField class.

test_cases.name: testTransformWithTransformFunction
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation functionality of the SimpleField class using a transform function.

test_cases.name: testTransformWithSupplier
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation functionality of the SimpleField class using a supplier.

test_cases.name: testTransformWithNullInputAndNoSupplier
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation functionality of the SimpleField class with null input and no supplier, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
